item.title: 估值焦虑从大型科技公司转移到 S&P 500 其他公司
item.description: 几个星期以来，人们越来越担心，S&P 500 指数不断创下新高，有可能成为泡沫。【原文：Worries have been mounting for weeks that the S&P 500’s push to record after record risks becoming a bubble, with the index’s swollen valuation cited most often as cause for concern.】

item.title: 菲律宾港口运营商 ICTSI 着眼于更多新兴市场交易
item.description: 国际集装箱码头服务公司（International Container Terminal Services, Inc.【原文：International Container Terminal Services, Inc. is pursuing further acquisitions in emerging economies, with the top Philippine port operator benefiting from a shift in trade flows triggered by the tariff war.】

item.title: 德国投资者情绪因出口希望而意外转好
item.description: 9 月份，投资者对德国经济前景的信心出乎意料地增强，这为欧洲最大经济体摆脱长期低迷带来了希望。【原文：Investor confidence in Germany’s economic prospects unexpectedly improved in September, supporting hopes that Europe’s largest economy is leaving behind a prolonged downturn.】

item.title: 如果摩根大通指数竞标成功，菲律宾将减少外国债券销售
item.description: 菲律宾财政部长莎伦-阿尔曼萨（Sharon Almanza）表示，如果菲律宾能被摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：The Philippines plans to reduce its foreign bond issuance next year if it wins inclusion in JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s flagship emerging-market debt index, Treasurer Sharon Almanza said.】

item.title: 乌克兰声称一夜之间袭击了俄罗斯萨拉托夫炼油厂
item.description: 在西方国家寻求将弗拉基米尔-普京总统推向谈判桌之际，乌克兰一夜之间袭击了俄罗斯伏尔加河地区的萨拉托夫原油炼油厂。【原文：Ukraine attacked the Saratov crude-oil refinery in Russia’s Volga region overnight as Western nations seek to push President Vladimir Putin to the negotiating table.】

item.title: 玻利维亚帕斯的最高经济顾问期待 40 亿美元的拯救计划
item.description: 玻利维亚中间派总统候选人罗德里戈-帕斯（Rodrigo Paz）的高级经济顾问表示，他计划在上任第一年向经济注入 40 亿美元，以促进经济增长和公共财政的健康发展。【原文：Bolivia’s centrist presidential hopeful Rodrigo Paz plans to inject $4 billion into the economy during his first year in office, according to his senior economic adviser, part of a bid to boost growth and promote healthier public finances.】

item.title: 人工智能成为战略关键，Trustpilot 上调利润率目标
item.description: Trustpilot Group Plc 提高了利润率指导，并推出了新的回购计划，因为这家客户点评公司将人工智能产品作为其战略的核心。【原文：Trustpilot Group Plc raised its margin guidance and launched a new buyback as the customer review company puts artificial intelligence products at the heart of its strategy.】

item.title: 英国购物者青睐超市品牌，食品通胀降温
item.description: 英国食品通胀率连续第二个月下降，报告显示购物者继续青睐超市的高端自有品牌产品。【原文：Food inflation cooled for a second month in the UK in a report that shows shoppers continued to favor supermarkets’ premium own-brand products.】

item.title: 国家养老金将上涨 4.7%，英国退休人员面临缴税问题
item.description: 在官方收入数据证实国家养老金将在明年 4 月上涨 4.7% 的通胀率后，英国的养老金领取者将从 2027 年开始为他们的国家退休金缴税。【原文：Britain’s pensioners are set to pay tax on their state retirement benefit from 2027 after official earnings data confirmed that the state pension will rise by an inflation-busting 4.7% next April.】

item.title: Janus 和贝莱德是失去荷兰信贷委托的管理公司之一
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：BlackRock Inc. is among a group of money managers to have lost credit mandates from one of Europe’s largest pension funds, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 医疗器械制造商明德瑞选择华泰和摩根大通在香港上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国最大的医疗设备制造商深圳明德生物医疗电子股份有限公司（Mindray Bio-Medical Electronics Co.【原文：China’s biggest maker of medical devices, Shenzhen Mindray Bio-Medical Electronics Co., has picked banks for its planned Hong Kong listing, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 据说阿曼化肥公司准备在马斯喀特上市
item.description: 阿曼印度化肥公司（Oman India Fertiliser Co SAOC）已开始为可能在马斯喀特上市做早期准备，这标志着阿曼苏丹国再次推动公司私有化并深化资本市场。【原文：Oman India Fertiliser Co SAOC has started early preparations for a potential listing in Muscat, marking a renewed push by the sultanate to privatize companies and deepen its capital markets.】

item.title: 印尼考虑新的中央银行授权和更简便的董事会撤职程序
item.description: 印尼立法者正在审议是否应进一步扩大中央银行的职责范围，并扩大解雇其官员的理由。【原文：Indonesian lawmakers are deliberating whether they should broaden the central bank’s mandate further and expand grounds for the dismissal of its officials.】

item.title: 摩根大通和野村牵头为 OTPP 牙科交易提供 5 亿欧元贷款
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）和野村控股公司（Nomura Holdings Inc. 是主导一揽子债务融资计划的银行之一，为安大略教师退休金计划收购西班牙牙科供应商 Donte Group 提供约 5 亿欧元（5.88 亿美元）的资金。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. and Nomura Holdings Inc. are among banks leading a debt financing package to provide about €500 million ($588 million) for Ontario Teachers’ Pension Plan’s acquisition of Spanish dental provider Donte Group.】

item.title: 凯雷投资的 Orion 啤酒公司将扩大后的首次公开募股定价定在最高端
item.description: Orion Breweries Ltd. 在股东增加出售股票数量后，将首次公开发行价定在了区间的最高点。【原文：Orion Breweries Ltd. set its initial public offering price at the top of the range after its shareholders boosted the number of shares to sell.】

item.title: 印度大宗商品交易所估值翻番，全球企业纷纷买入
item.description: 印度国家商品及衍生品交易所有限公司（National Commodity & Derivatives Exchange Ltd.）的非上市股票大涨，因为包括全球高速交易公司在内的投资者在该公司进军股票市场之前购买了其股份。【原文：The unlisted shares of India’s National Commodity & Derivatives Exchange Ltd. have surged after investors including global high-speed trading firms bought stakes in the company ahead of its foray into equities.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长卡扎克认为目前没有理由降息
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员马丁斯-卡扎克认为，欧洲中央银行目前无需降低利率。【原文：European Central Bank interest rates currently don’t need to be reduced, according to Governing Council member Martins Kazaks.】

item.title: 芯片公司UTAC的出售计划引起金光集团和TCL的兴趣
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，私募股权公司 Wise Road Capital 已为可能出售半导体组装和测试公司 UTAC Holdings Ltd. 的竞标者入围名单。【原文：Private equity firm Wise Road Capital has shortlisted bidders for the potential sale of semiconductor assembly and testing company UTAC Holdings Ltd., according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 欧元向四年来最高点迈进，1.20 美元水平指日可待
item.description: 随着交易员们为美联储本周的降息做好准备，欧元正朝着四年来最强劲的水平迈进，这将巩固其与欧洲央行背离的发展轨迹。【原文：The euro edged toward its strongest level in four years as traders prepared for an interest-rate cut from the Federal Reserve this week that will cement its diverging trajectory from the European Central Bank.】

item.title: 盎格鲁集团与智利国家铜业公司同意在智利联合开发铜矿
item.description: 英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）与智利国营铜业公司 Codelco 签署了一项协议，共同开发双方在圣地亚哥附近的相邻矿山，以期在不进行大规模投资的情况下提高产量。【原文：Anglo American Plc signed an agreement with Chile’s state copper company Codelco to jointly develop their adjacent mines near Santiago in a bid to boost production without major investments.】

item.title: 联合利华任命代理首席财务官帕塔克永久任职
item.description: 联合利华股份公司（Unilever PLC）任命斯里尼瓦斯-法塔克（Srinivas Phatak）为首席财务官，接替在董事会改组后升任首席执行官的费尔南多-费尔南德斯（Fernando Fernandez）。【原文：Unilever PLC appointed Srinivas Phatak as its chief financial officer, replacing Fernando Fernandez who was promoted to chief executive officer following a board reshuffle.】

item.title: 劳动力市场疲软，英国就业率下降，工资增长放缓
item.description: 官方数据显示，英国劳动力市场在夏季继续降温，因为企业担心更多的增税措施会对经济造成冲击。【原文：The UK labor market continued to cool over the summer as firms braced for more tax increases to hit the economy, official figures show.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国就业数据公布前英镑上涨
澳大利亚皇家银行的豪瑟认为养老基金对冲基金大幅增长
item.description: 储备银行副行长安德鲁-豪瑟（Andrew Hauser）表示，从长期来看，澳大利亚养老基金预计将 "大幅 "扩大其外汇对冲账簿，同时他还补充说，有关美元消亡的预测是错误的。【原文：Australia’s pension funds are expected to expand their foreign-exchange hedge books “substantially” over the long term, Reserve Bank Deputy Governor Andrew Hauser said, while adding that predictions of the dollar’s demise are misplaced.】

item.title: 智能手机制造商 Nothing 融资 2 亿美元打造人工智能设备
item.description: 成立仅五年的智能手机制造商 Nothing Technologies Ltd. 已融资 2 亿美元，以尝试开发下一代人工智能原生设备。【原文：Nothing Technologies Ltd., a smartphone maker founded just five years ago, has raised $200 million to try and develop the next generation of AI-native devices.】

item.title: 科技老兵塞尔比：人工智能的狂热可能是迄今为止最大的泡沫
item.description: AZ-VC 创始人兼管理合伙人杰克-塞尔比（Jack Selby）说，围绕人工智能的兴奋情绪可能导致了私人技术投资领域迄今为止最大的泡沫，这为初创企业估值的修正敲响了警钟。【原文：The euphoria around artificial intelligence may have led to the biggest bubble yet in private technology investing, AZ-VC founder and managing partner Jack Selby said, sounding warning bells that a correction in startup valuations is in the cards.】

item.title: 国际能源机构称，全球每年必须花费 5400 亿美元寻找石油和天然气
item.description: 据国际能源机构称，到 2050 年，全球每年需要花费约 5400 亿美元寻找石油和天然气，以维持目前的产量。【原文：The world needs to spend some $540 billion a year looking for oil and gas to maintain current output by 2050, according to the International Energy Agency.】

item.title: 亨特称澳大利亚央行 "非常接近 "通胀和就业目标
item.description: 澳大利亚央行行长助理莎拉-亨特（Sarah Hunter）表示，澳大利亚央行 "非常接近 "将通胀率恢复到2-3%的目标中点，同时经济接近充分就业。【原文：Australia’s central bank is “pretty close” to getting inflation back to the midpoint of its 2-3% target while the economy is near full employment, Assistant Governor Sarah Hunter said.】

item.title: 高盛认为债券收益率动荡下一步将冲击五年期债券领域
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：The next pain point for bond traders may come in the five-year part of the curve, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc. strategists.】

item.title: 越南敦促美国重新考虑海鲜禁令，贸易谈判仍在继续
item.description: 越南敦促美国重新考虑一项有效禁止某些海产品出口的裁决，并警告说这可能会扰乱双边贸易，使东南亚国家的海产品行业每年损失 5 亿美元。【原文：Vietnam has urged the US to reconsider a ruling that effectively bans certain seafood exports, warning it could disrupt bilateral trade and cost the Southeast Asian nation’s seafood industry $500 million in annual losses.】
